issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add castBIGINT, extractDay interval_day functions in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7335](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7335). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Function SIgnatures:

`int64 castBIGINT(day_time_interval)`

`int64 extractDay(day_time_interval)`
